title: Underground Catacombs Adventure #72
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Ancient Burial Chamber
rooms.description: A dimly lit stone chamber deep beneath the earth. Flickering torches cast dancing shadows on walls lined with burial niches. Ancient bones rest in alcoves carved into the rock. The air is cold and smells of damp stone and age. Water drips somewhere in the darkness.

items.name: stone altar
items.description: A weathered altar covered in dust and cobwebs. Strange symbols are carved into its surface.

items.name: ancient journal
items.description: A leather-bound journal, remarkably preserved despite its age
items.text: Journal of Brother Marcus, Year 1523: We three founders built these catacombs - myself, Sister Helena, and Father Dominic. Sister Helena passed in 1489, Father Dominic in 1501, and I fear my time draws near. The combination to the relic box honors our deaths in order: Helena, Dominic, then myself.

items.name: burial niches
items.description: Stone alcoves containing ancient skeletal remains wrapped in decaying cloth

items.name: rusty iron key
items.description: A heavy iron key, corroded with age but still functional

items.name: ornate relic box
items.description: A decorated stone box with a combination lock featuring three rotating number wheels

items.name: bronze key
items.description: An ornate bronze key with religious symbols etched into its surface

items.name: catacomb map
items.description: A faded map showing the layout of the underground passages
items.text: Map of the Sacred Catacombs: The three founders rest in the Hall of Remembrance. Sister Helena in the Chapel of Light, Father Dominic in the Sanctuary of Peace, Brother Marcus in the Chamber of Wisdom. The secret exit lies beyond the hall, accessible only to those who know our history.

items.name: wooden chest
items.description: A rotting wooden chest bound with iron bands

items.name: lit torch
items.description: A torch that burns with an eternal flame, providing light in the darkness

items.name: heavy stone door
items.description: A massive stone door with a bronze lock mechanism. Ancient script warns: 'Only the worthy may pass.'

rooms.name: Hall of Remembrance
rooms.description: A long corridor lined with elaborate tombs and memorial plaques. Carved stone pillars support the vaulted ceiling. Three grand tomb monuments dominate the hall, each dedicated to one of the founders. The walls are covered with inscriptions and religious imagery. A sealed doorway stands at the far end.

items.name: tomb of Sister Helena
items.description: An elegant marble tomb with an angel statue. Fresh flowers somehow still rest upon it.
items.text: Here lies Sister Helena (1420-1489), Keeper of the Chapel of Light. She brought illumination to the darkness and tended the sacred flames. Her wisdom guided all who sought the light.

items.name: tomb of Father Dominic
items.description: A grand stone sarcophagus carved with scenes of prayer and devotion
items.text: Here rests Father Dominic (1435-1501), Guardian of the Sanctuary of Peace. He offered solace to troubled souls and maintained the sacred silence. His prayers echo still in these halls.

items.name: tomb of Brother Marcus
items.description: A simple but dignified tomb with an open book carved into the stone
items.text: Here lies Brother Marcus (1438-1523), Master of the Chamber of Wisdom. He preserved knowledge and recorded our history. His words guide us even in death.

items.name: memorial wall
items.description: A wall covered in plaques commemorating those buried in the catacombs

items.name: scroll of the founders
items.description: A preserved scroll detailing the history of the catacombs
items.text: The Three Founders: Sister Helena kept the Chapel of Light, Father Dominic guarded the Sanctuary of Peace, and Brother Marcus mastered the Chamber of Wisdom. Together they created these sacred catacombs as a final resting place for the faithful.

items.name: offering alcove
items.description: A small alcove containing ancient religious artifacts and offerings

items.name: silver cross
items.description: A tarnished silver cross, a symbol of faith from centuries past

items.name: sealed stone doorway
items.description: An imposing doorway sealed with ancient magic. Three questions are carved into the stone, glowing with faint blue light.

password_questions.question: Who kept the Chapel of Light?
password_questions.hint: Read the tomb inscriptions to learn about each founder's role

password_questions.question: Where did Father Dominic serve?
password_questions.hint: Check Father Dominic's tomb for information about his sacred place

password_questions.question: What did Brother Marcus master?
password_questions.hint: Brother Marcus's tomb reveals what he was master of

rooms.name: Secret Exit Chamber
rooms.description: You have found the hidden exit! A narrow stone staircase spirals upward, leading to the surface. Fresh air flows down from above, carrying the scent of grass and freedom. Sunlight filters through cracks in the ceiling, illuminating ancient inscriptions that read: 'Those who honor the past may walk into the future.'

items.name: spiral staircase
items.description: Ancient stone steps leading upward to freedom and daylight

items.name: exit inscription
items.description: Final words carved by the founders
items.text: You have proven yourself worthy by honoring our memory and understanding our legacy. Go forth into the light, and remember those who rest in the darkness below.

rooms.win_message: You have successfully navigated the ancient catacombs and discovered the secret exit! As you climb the stone staircase, the weight of centuries falls away. You emerge into sunlight, leaving the underground burial chambers behind. The spirits of the three founders rest peacefully, their history preserved and honored. You win!
